Default_: ^Buongiorno. Did you need something from me dear?
closing_: ^It's such a shame, this bakery was a beautiul place, always full of life and people. Very bitter-sweet, like good chocolate.
closing0DanniRiccobono_: ^I assume you didn't know about the bakery closing until you got here?
closing0GiovanniRiccobono_: ^I wonder what he thinks about the bakery closing, I remember it meant a lot to him.
closing0LuccaRomana_: ^I don't know how he feels about closing it. I haven't talked to him since last week.
closing0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^It's such a shame Lucca shut it down.
closing0UncleLucca_: ^Oh you mean Lucca Romana? I don't really know why he is closing the bakery, he is getting too old probably.
DanniRiccobono_: ^Oh, you must be Giovanni's granddaughter! He used to run this bakery when I was a little girl. He was always such a kind man, a shame that he left town, but I am glad he’s happy now.
DanniRiccobono0GiovanniRiccobono_: ^Oh, you must be his granddaughter! Giovanni used to run this bakery when I was a little girl. He was always such a kind man, a shame that he left town, but I am glad he’s happy now.
DanniRiccobono0LuccaRomana_: ^I wonder if he will know you. If you find him he might be willing to talk to you.
DanniRiccobono0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^I wish you could have seen the bakery when it was open. Knowing Lucca he might reopen it, he never quits.
DanniRiccobono0UncleLucca_: ^Oh you mean Lucca Romana? I didn't know he had a neice. I would just call him Lucca Romana, he might not know he is even your uncle!
GiovanniRiccobono_: ^Your grandfather is a good man, I remember that he used to give me an extra loaf when I picked up the bread for my mother. He was always so kind to us and the rest of the town.
GiovanniRiccobono0LuccaRomana_: ^If I can remember they had a fight about the bakery awhile back. They always seemed so close, but you know what they say, all stories have an ending.
GiovanniRiccobono0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^I wonder what he thinks about this old place, so many memories here, great and bad.
GiovanniRiccobono0UncleLucca_: ^I wonder if your Uncle Lucca and grandpa would even get along now.
LuccaRomana_: ^He is a great man. He has run Piccola Panetteria solo for such a long time now. I wonder if he is retiring for good, he deserves some rest especially after everything he has been through.
LuccaRomana0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^I wonder why Lucca has run the bakery all these years. It seems to be the sole thing he lived for, I wonder what he is gonna do now.
PiccolaPanetteria_: ^Ah what a cute little place. This place was known all around town for it's morning pasteries, it's going to be so strange now that it's closing!
PiccolaPanetteria0UncleLucca_: ^I wonder why Lucca Romana has run the bakery all these years. It seems to be the sole thing he lived for, I wonder what he is gonna do now.
UncleLucca_: ^Oh you mean Lucca Romana? I didn't know he had a neice. I would just call him Lucca Romana, he might not know he is even your uncle!

closing0DanniRiccobono_: ^I don't know what my bakery has to do with you.
closing0GiovanniRiccobono_: ^Your grandfather doesn't probably care about me closing the bakery. He wanted to get away from it, and me.
closing0LuccaRomana_: ^I decided to close it cause I was left to work it alone all these years and I am tired. Giovanni abandoned me all those years ago, so it's time I learn from him and do something for myself.
closing0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^Yeah, I am closing Piccola Panetteria. Some folks are very upset about it but it's time to let go.
closing0UncleLucca_: ^Why are you calling me Uncle Lucca, I don't feel like your uncle. Just call me by my name.
DanniRiccobono_: ^You resemble your grandfather in some ways...I know you are not him. I am not mad at you don't worry. I am actually glad you came to talk to me, I always wanted to meet you.
DanniRiccobono0GiovanniRiccobono_: ^The last time I talked to Giovanni he did mention you, but that was when you were just a toddler. It's been a long time...
DanniRiccobono0LuccaRomana_: ^I know you don't know me that well, but I don't have much to do anymore so I would love to talk to you. Maybe share some stories you might not know about your grandfather.
DanniRiccobono0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^I am sorry I am closing the bakery before you got a chnace to see it, but I can bake you anything you want even without the ol place.
DanniRiccobono0UncleLucca_: ^I don't really know if I am your uncle. I certainly don't feel like I have been there enough for you to be called that. Just call me Lucca Romana for now.
GiovanniRiccobono_: ^I don't really want to talk about him right now...
GiovanniRiccobono0LuccaRomana_: ^Me and your grandfather have a strange relationship. I still see him as my brother, and I remember when things were better...but people change.
GiovanniRiccobono0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^I imagine he doesn't know much about the bakery now.
GiovanniRiccobono0UncleLucca_: ^I am suprised he wanted you to call me your uncle. I didn't know he still saw me as that.
LuccaRomana_: ^That's me, I guess you already knew that.
LuccaRomana0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^That bakery was my life, it's the reason I am still in this town.
PiccolaPanetteria_: ^I am proud of that place, or at least what I managed to turn it into. It's had quite a history, it's gone through a lot of changes.
PiccolaPanetteria0UncleLucca_: ^I don't really know if I am your uncle. I certainly don't feel like I have been there enough for you to be called that. Just call me Lucca Romana for now.
UncleLucca_: ^I don't really know if I am your uncle. I certainly don't feel like I have been there enough for you to be called that. Just call me Lucca Romana for now.
